snippet: Hundreds have fled as a fire near Fort Collins, Colo., has burned across nearly 60 square miles and fires in New Mexico have scorched almost 500 square miles.
abstract: Hundreds of local residents evacuate as a fast-growing wildfire near Fort Collins, Colo, burns across nearly 60 square miles and fires in New Mexico scorch almost 500 square miles.
lead_paragraph: Hundreds have fled as a fire near Fort Collins, Colo., has burned across nearly 60 square miles and fires in New Mexico have scorched almost 500 square miles.

headline.seo: Wildfires Rage in Colorado and New Mexico
headline.main: Wildfires Engulf Forests and Homes in the West
headline.print_headline: Wildfires Engulf Forests And Homes in the West
